DOC.brief_title: Prediction High Ovarian Response After Assisted Reproductive Techniques
DOC.detailed_description: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) common endocrine disorder woman . It affect 10 % patient undergo assisted reproductive technique ( ART ) . Rotterdam criterion define European Society Human Reproduction Endocrinology ( ESHRE ) use diagnosis PCOS . According criterion , PCOS affect 5-10 % woman reproductive age . Patients PCOS accord Rotterdam criterion , well polycystic ovary ultrasound , high risk exaggerate response ovulation induction therapy . Complications ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) include hemoconcentration , thromboembolic disorder , electrolyte disorder , ascites , hydrothorax , ovarian torsion , respiratory failure , liver failure , kidney failure even death . There lack reliable marker indicate risk OHSS . It also unknown whether specific criterion propose Rotterdam consensus important another independently influence result ARTs . The aim study determine prevalence PCOS infertile patient require ART Center evaluate usefulness specific diagnosis criterion PCOS predictor risk OHSS . It also seek establish cohort patient identify accord specific Rotterdam criterion PCOS ass incidence long term complication .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients primary infertility undergo ovarian stimulation IVF/ICSI plus one follow criterion : 1 . Ovulation dysfunction . 2 . Androgen excess : clinical and/or biochemical . 3 . Polycystic ovary transvaginal ultrasound early follicular phase . 4 . AMH > 35 pmol/l 5 . FSH/LH < 1 6 . P4 level day menstrual cycle < 10ng/ml cycle duration < 26 day 7 . Patients undergo second cycle previous one consider high responder ( cycle cancel due high risk OHSS patient underwent coast ) 1 . Age < 18 > 39 year 2 . FSH > 10 3 . Uterine fibroid require surgery 4 . Diagnosis hyperprolactinemia , hypothyroidism , congenital adrenal hyperplasia , Cushing 's syndrome , ovarian tumor , adrenal tumor hypogonadotropic hypogonadism 5 . Intake oral contraceptive three month prior completion IVF 6 . Diagnosis endometriosis ( ultrasound surgical finding )
